ResourceMgmt.cpp

00001 /*
00002  * ResourceMgmt.cpp
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 16.05.2010
00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  *
00007  *  This small but effective code guarantees that the file the game is looking for are really loaded.
00008  *  It looks into global and local as needed.
00009  */
00010 
00011 #include "ResourceMgmt.h"
00012 #include "../FindFile.h"
00013 #include "../CLogFile.h"
00014 #include "../keen.h"
00015 
00016 const std::string GLOBAL_DIR = "global";
00017 
00018 /**
00019  * \brief This function will look for certain files used in the game. It looks on the local dir
00020  *    and is it didn't find the file, it will look on the global director GLOBAL_DIR. In case
00021  *    it finds something there, it return that alternate path.
00022  *  \param filename  the filename for which we are looking
00023  *  \param gamepath  if a game started, path to that one
00024  *  \param essential  essential means whether the file is really needed or the game can live without it.
00025  *  \param can_be_global This means, that the file can be read from the global directory. In some cases it must not.
00026  */
00027 std::string getResourceFilename(const std::string& filename, const std::string& gamepath,
00028         bool essential, bool can_be_global)
00029 {
00030  std::string text;
00031  std::string vfs_path;
00032 
00033  if(gamepath != "")
00034  {
00035   vfs_path = JoinPaths(gamepath, filename);
00036   text = "Looking for " + vfs_path + " ... ";
00037   // try to look at the local path of the game.
00038   if(!IsFileAvailable(vfs_path))
00039    vfs_path = "";
00040  }
00041 
00042  if(vfs_path == "" && can_be_global)
00043  {
00044   // if it didn't find the file try looking at the global resources
00045   vfs_path = JoinPaths(GLOBAL_DIR, filename);
00046   text = "Looking for " + vfs_path + " ... ";
00047 
00048   if(!IsFileAvailable(vfs_path))
00049    vfs_path = "";
00050  }
00051 
00052  if( vfs_path == "" )
00053  {
00054   if(essential)
00055   {
00056    text += "missing!\n";
00057    text += "The file " + filename + " was not found. Please provide that file!\n";
00058   }
00059   else
00060    text += "missing, but not needed!\n";
00061  }
00062  else
00063   text += "found!\n";
00064 
00065  g_pLogFile->textOut(GREEN, text);
00066 
00067  return vfs_path;
00068 }
